name: High Gloss ~ mens unisex sterling silver ring
description:
High polish, thick weighty sterling silver ring. Not a circle! It's shaped to fit comfortably on a finger; this is more naturally shaped, well, like a finger is shaped. It puts less pressure on the side flanking fingers and the finger tendons so it's perfect for a thick ring like this one and for a person unused to wearing rings.

Suitable for a man as well as for a woman who would like a simple striking piece. Available in high gloss or brushed finish.

The ring is made to your order for perfect sizing and to allow for customizations. Please allow 10 days for hand crafting.



~*~~~*~~~*~~~*~~~*~~~*~~~*~~~
If you don't know your ring size, I have ring sizer tools available upon request. (Purchase a sizer & receive a small discount when you purchase a ring.) Happy to convert international ring sizes.

This style can be customized (stamped) if you wish to memorialize a date, or dedicate, or use as a replacement/workday wedding band. Send me a message if you're interested. Imprinting will have additional charges for time and refinishing. 
See my flickr account for examples!
http://www.flickr.com/photos/zestyb/

name: Hold On Tight - sterling silver unisex cuff bracelet
description:
Exquisitely simple sterling silver cuff bracelet. Handmade.
The surface texture is created to your desires. It could be super smooth and shiny, hammered with hundreds of facets, or oxidized and tumbled for a distressed texture.


Cut, formed, shaped, and finished by hand. This will sneak over your wrist with a twist. Designed to be snug on your wrist, it's an oval that is 2.5in (65mm) across. It is 1/2 in tall (12mm).


Should you wish it, this style can be personalized on the inside and/or outside with a name, date, or a favorite saying. The cuff is made to your order, so please allow for a few additional days for your receipt of the bracelet.




~*~~~*~~~*~~~*~~~*~~~*~~~*~~~
Image shows brushed surface.
If requested, imprinting is done by hand and will incur additional time and materials. Please add $15 for most imprinting. Imprinted items are made to order so please allow 10 days lead time in addition to regular shipping estimates. If you have a particularly long passage please do send me a message or email to make sure the bracelet can accommodate it.




z-24

name: Simple Classic Golden Hoops - medium gold filled earrings
description:
Sometimes the basics are best. Light weight hand formed hoops, with a ton of class.

Medium sized gold~filled hand formed hoops ~ about 1 3/8 in (35mm) long.
Small sized hoops ~ about 5/8 in (15mm) long.



Available in larger sizes upon request with small additional cost.

Jewelry is tissue wrapped & boxed up pretty for shipping. All ready for gifting. Feel free to contact me with any questions you have.


z-06

name: Itty Bitty Tiny Bubbles - sterling silver wire wrap ring
description:
Imagine the air bubbles caught in kelp seaweed ~ or the air pockets frozen in ice ~ even the electrons whirling and dancing around a nucleus. You have an idea of the ring.

This ring is sterling silver wire wrapped around several times to form a flat 'ribbon' band. Round sterling silver beads have been randomly threaded on to the wire; The beads can move a bit, but only as far as the connector brace wrap. It's like a set of stacker rings only all connected together.

The ring is made to order, so please include your ring size in the notes to seller, and allow and extra 5 days for shipping.




~*~~~*~~~*~~~*~~~*~~~*~~~*~~~*~~~*~~~*~~~*~~~*~~~*~~~*~~~*~~
If you don't know your ring size, I have ring sizers available for a small fee upon request. Happy to convert international ring sizes, add half sizes, or a size not listed if you require. Just send me a message!






z-22

name: Night Smashing - sterling silver earrings
description:
These earrings are smashing and dark. Small and light, the facets catch the eye. Perfect for all the time everyday anywhere.

Hand made sterling silver ovals with with an oxidized pebbled texture on hand made sterling earwires. They hang less than an inch (23mm) long.

Bright silver is also available.. (Not pictured.)


Jewelry is tissue wrapped & packaged with anti-tarnish strips for shipping. Boxed up pretty ready for gifting, including clear rubber earring clutches.





z-04
